forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the night, Downtown San Francisco rests under a quilt of clouds, whispering promises of a clearer day ahead. The air is soft, carrying the scent of the ocean, while temperatures hover pleasantly at 57 degrees. As dawn approaches, the clouds begin to part, revealing the glimmers of a mostly sunny Thursday to come. Anticipation brews in the city’s heart, where the sun will rise to cast golden beams across the skyline, nudging temperatures towards a comfortable high of around 67 degrees by midday.

While the marine layer may still cling to the heights, especially along the coastal edges, the day is on the brink of transformation, with hints of sunshine breaking through the grey. A vestige of mist may linger in spots, but the clouds are breaking up, showcasing the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge against a more vibrant backdrop. As the afternoon sun begins to mellow toward 65, gentle winds from the west will dance through the streets, promising a refreshingly breezy escapade. Light layers will serve you well—consider a light jacket for the morning chill, before trading it for a comfortable shirt as the warmth embraces the city. 

With the sun emerging, the conditions invite you to enjoy the simple pleasures of the day. Take a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, relish a conversation over coffee at a small café, or perhaps explore one of the quieter neighborhoods where the charm of San Francisco unfolds at every corner. Embrace the rhythm of the city as it awakens; perfect escapades await in the lively streets and hidden gems alike.
